name: Astral Projectile
description:
You are a meteor. Escape the enemy alien ships that are out to harvest you for their own selfish purposes. Turn the tables on your enemies by slingshotting around planets and black holes and pushing enemies into them at high speed! Dash about the solar system with abandon and be free... until the black hole expands, eats everything in the universe up and you run out of space.

All sounds and music in the game are from the WeLoveIndies catalogue provided for the jam. Everything else is made in-house!

Team TeeTime

https://konverex.itch.io/
https://flobbadob.itch.io/
https://anantha1093.itch.io/
